body:
Apologies for a non-technical post made to this list with the purpose
of congratulating the work done in Bitcoin Core.


I expreienced some time delay in getting this message posted due to the concerted efforts of a certain BTCdak who felt this encouraging message would be better suited to the shit-talking spew-breath at #bitcoin-discuss where I won't post because of the effluent manifested there.

Slap round your fucking head BTCdrak. You Andresen-legacy bossy man.

My message is:

For a change, a cool evening in the south of Thailand, with a new moon
encouraging introspection over the calm Andaman Sea.

Sincere gratitude to the core developers and all Core contributors.
Despite pervasive negative social mood towards this group and its
productive output, Bitcoin continues to improve in its security, the
efficiency of its network and its prospects for the future as Layer 1
of a thriving censorship-resistant asset-based economy.

Isn't it surprising how productive this space has become since the
departure of the disruptive Mike Hearn? R3 will discover that
blockchain is great - but impractical - without vested interest and
incentivised participation. Hopefully, habitual consensus breakers
such as Gavin Andresen will also, eventually, ostracize themselves
from this purpose-driven group. As always, continue proposing
innovative (even contentious) ideas, but campaign them at the peril of
your creditworthiness.

Please continue the endevour of making a defiant programmable money
that doesn't buckle to the demands of a failing credit-based economy
or the opportunistic business interests that serve it. Detractors,
such as Coinbase, are ultimately dependent for their survival on
Silicon Valley Bank - a satellite of the Fed - the antithesis of what
Bitcoin represents.

Regarding the invocation of ClassicCoin, my international base of
clients and I are committed to continue transacting on, and mining,
the Bitcoin Core blockchain, indefinitely. We do so because of the
fundamental value of the caliber of development happening in Core and
the innovation of Segregated Witness. As speculators, investors and
miners we welcome the latter-day fee increases and the fundamental
value embodied by network security and the Rule of Consensus.

You're doing great work here.


Long Live Bitcoin! Long Live!


best regards,
Venzen Khaosan
title: Strong Consensus-Driven Bitcoin
